name: religiousUpheavalLate
rules: Draw cards from the Principality deck, 2 in a 5-6 Player game, 3 in a 7-8 Player game. The drawn Principalities convert.

name: religiousUpheavalEarly
rules: Draw X cards from the Principality deck, where X = # of Players, redrawing for any Principalities already Protestant. All provinces from drawn Principalities convert to Protestantism. In addition, all Player non-capital provinces adjacent to the capitals of the converted Principalities convert to Protestantism.

name: piusOttomans
rules: If the Council has not concluded, St. Pius V holds the Council of Trent outside of the Empire, defeats the Ottomans at Lepanto, and the Catholic Reformation begins.

name: deathOfEmperor
rules: The Emperor is dead! Hold an Imperial Election.
